availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James F. Curtright (Hopkins Co., KY, constable)

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, constable and farmer. Harden County, Kentucky, native. Married to Mary H. Kirkwood Curtright in Hopkins County, Kentucky, on August 21, 1853. Father of Mary L. Curtright, Alice B. Curtright, and Wilbur Curtright. Constable in Hopkins County in 1860. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, p. 636.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, Seminary, p. 133B-134A.
